body:
DC-ASGD is an optimizer described in this [paper](https://arxiv.org/abs/1609.08326)

Frameworks like [MXNET](https://mxnet.apache.org/api/python/optimization/optimization.html#mxnet.optimizer.DCASGD) have the feature, are there plans to implement this feature into PyTorch? 

If approved by community, I would like to start the process of a feature request. I'm happy to create a pull request and implement the code after discussion.
